name: Square Dodge (Anonymous282007)
description:
This is a game in which you need to dodge all those blue square so that they don't touch and kill you. You are allowed to shoot them but you will lose your score point

So the less people you kill the more points you will have

I know the game is not too good but as it is my second game i am quite proud of this game

Credits:

All of the game assets used in the game are from unity

SFXR for game sounds
